BigNews: <CN>截至今年7月,美国天气和气候灾害造成逾10亿美元损失</CN><EN>As of July this year, weather and climate disasters in the United States have caused more than $1 billion in losses</EN>

<CN>UTC时间21点后加密货币市场闪崩,BTC和ETH大跌10%以上,随后大幅拉回。全市场爆仓10亿$以上,爆仓规模史上第三</CN><EN>After 21:00 UTC time, the cryptocurrency market crashed. BTC and ETH plummeted by more than 10%, and then pulled back sharply. The entire market liquidated more than $1 billion, the third largest liquidation in history</EN>
